Deduction Details: Incorrect implementation of sumRow function. It takes no row index as input, prompts the user for input, and accesses the array out of bounds (matrix[5][7]). It also calculates the sum incorrectly and prints the result inside the function instead of returning it. (-2); Incorrect indexing in sumRow function. Using comma operator instead of proper array indexing (matrix[i,j] instead of matrix[i][j]). (-1); The sumRow function should return the sum, not print it. (-1)
